document.full_text: the n.f.l. and players continue to wait for the court of appeals for the eighth circuit to rule on the league's request for a full stay through the appeal of an injunction.
document.title: n.f.l. continues effort to maintain lockout
lines_and_colors: the n.f.l. and players continue to wait for the court of appeals for the eighth circuit to rule on the league's request for a full stay through the appeal of an injunction.
